<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">If you have read this brittle & imperfect sketch, with its</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">exaggerations, its foreshortenings <del>you will complain</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">will <del>come to say</del> <del>given,</del> you will complain;</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><rs type="place" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#pla-towe" key="Tower of London">London</rs> to a visitor from the country.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>The</del> <del>What we will now attempt then is</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the famous monuments from another angle</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>to wander to for a moment, in free from</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">had a hand in the <rs type="literary-work" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#lit-reve" key="Revenger's Tragedy, The">Revengers Tragedy</rs> –</l>
